entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
